summary: floppy - Join Floppy, the charismatic creation of Matt Furie and ​trading icon for degens worldwide, as he hops to the top ​of the crypto markets, forging strong trading alliances and ​seizing exciting opportunities. Take a bet on floppy the ​rabbit, and watch your luck bounce! Floppy isn't just your ​average rabbit, he's a ​living crypto icon!
